titles.title: Expressing support for designation of the week of March 3 through 9, 2013, as "School Social Work Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 3/4/2013--Introduced. Expresses support for the designation of School Social Work Week. Honors the contributions of school social workers to the success of students in schools.
